      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17310114">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310114">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310114">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17310114">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310114" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310115">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310115">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310115">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17310115">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310115" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310116">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310116">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310116">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Evaluating resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310116">
          <p>
           Visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            <em>
             Evaluating Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           page.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310116" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17310139">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310139">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310139">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I go for brainstorming and narrowing a topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310139">
          <div id="boxatt17310139" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383985">
              <a id="link_20383985" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383985,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good source for brainstorming for ideas, and narrowing a topic. A communally-edited site. Non-scholarly. Compare this resource to Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310117">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310117">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310117">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly introductions to my paper topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310117">
          <p>
           history and culture of Latin America. . .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310117" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383995">
              <a id="link_20383995" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383995,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383998">
              <a id="link_20383998" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+mexico+history+society+and+culture&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383998,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20078113}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Mexico
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384001">
              Oxford Encyclopedia of Mesoamerican Cultures
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Ref Collection 972.01 098e)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384002">
              Traditional Festivals: A Multicultural Encyclopedia
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Ref Collection 394.2603 R888t)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310118">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310118">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310118">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310118">
          <div id="boxatt17310118" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383941">
              <a id="link_20383941" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383941,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20383941}); ">
               Trexler Library Catalog
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of all books and documents in Trexler Library at Muhlenberg College.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310187">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310187">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310187">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I preview books online?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310187">
          <div id="boxatt17310187" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20384024">
              <a id="link_20384024" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384024,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310119">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310119">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310119">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed (scholarly) journal articles (in Spanish and English)?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310119">
          <div id="boxatt17310119" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383946">
              <a id="link_20383946" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383946,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly. English only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383944">
              <a id="link_20383944" href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383944,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20383944}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Includes extensive full text, from scholarly periodicals across the disciplines. English, Portuguese, Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384034">
              <a id="link_20384034" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384034,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text. English, Portuguese, Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384043">
              <a id="link_20384043" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384043,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20384043}); ">
               PRISMA
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Index and full text to journals published in and about Latin America, across the disciplines. English, Portuguese, Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384041">
              <a id="link_20384041" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384041,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Index to historical research about Latin America and Spain. English, Portuguese, Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20384051">
              <a id="link_20384051" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384051,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811735}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to sociological research. English, Portuguese, Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310120">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310120">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310120">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Web search engines and directories
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310120">
          <div id="boxatt17310120" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20384062">
              <a id="link_20384062" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20384062,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Women in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855144}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4699019" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17310121">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310121">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310121">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17310121">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310121" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17310122">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17310122">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17310122">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17310122">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17310122" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
